entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the water near noon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the water. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 10.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the water in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
